Aspen.notify_me_description: Notify me when this product is available:
Aspen.checkout_heading_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
Aspen.checkout_body_font: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif, 'Apple Color Emoji', 'Segoe UI Emoji', 'Segoe UI Symbol'
Aspen.feature1_description: Go to the Themes » Customize Theme section to get started setting up the Parallax theme.
Aspen.feature2_description: Checkout our Support Center for theme-related articles, or the Shopify Manual for general shop setup.
Aspen.feature3_description: Publish Parallax as your main theme when you're ready to launch. Let us know about new shop launches on Twitter!
Aspen.newsletter_description: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …
Aspen.newsletter_success_text: Thank you for joining our mailing list!
Aspen.supported_currencies: USD CAD AUD GBP EUR JPY
